content.text:
# 2018 Empire Slovak Open – Doubles

Jessica Moore Galina Voskoboeva
| runner   =  Xenia Knoll Anna Smith
| score    = 0–6, 6–3, [10–7]
| type     = singles doubles
| before_name = Empire Slovak Open – Doubles
| after_name = Empire Slovak Open – Doubles
}}
Naomi Broady and Heather Watson were the defending champions, however Watson chose not to participate, while Broady chose to compete at the 2018 Kurume U.S.E Cup.
Jessica Moore and Galina Voskoboeva won the title after defeating Xenia Knoll and Anna Smith 0–6, 6–3, [10–7] in the final.
Seeds
Xenia Knoll /  Anna Smith (final)
#  Viktorija Golubic /  Yanina Wickmayer (withdrew)
#  Darija Jurak /  Cornelia Lister (first round)
#  Kaitlyn Christian /  Sabrina Santamaria (quarterfinals)
}}
